segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely focused on her task of drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is lovely, but what's more striking is her obliviousness to the water overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of worry for her; the floor is getting dangerously slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so serene, like she is in another world, while everything around her is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good, and she doesn’t even notice!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies, perched on that flimsy stool that’s clearly one step away from disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, with her hand raised in anticipation, adding to the chaos without a clue of the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
